StylelintDisableAll.description: Disable all rules for the rest of the file

StylelintEnableAll.description: Enable all rules for the rest of the file

StylelintDisableRules.description: Disable the listed rules for the rest of the file

StylelintEnableRules.description: Enable the listed rules for the rest of the file

StylelintDisableLine.description: Disables all rules for the current line

StylelintEnableLine.description: Enables all rules for the current line

StylelintDisableLineRules.description: Disables the listed rules for the current line

StylelintEnableLineRules.description: Enables the listed rules for the current line

StylelintDisableNextLine.description: Disables all rules for the following line

StylelintEnableNextLine.description: Enables all rules for the following line

StylelintDisableNextLineRules.description: Disables the listed rules for the following line

StylelintEnableNextLineRules.description: Enables the listed rules for the following line
